title: Magic Merge: Tower Defense 3D
description: Magic Merge: Tower Defense 3D is a captivating casual tower defense game. Your kingdom is under threat from an evil army, and you must protect it. Expand your castle, unlock powerful towers, engage in strategic merges, and upgrade your defenses to thwart dragons, trolls, goblins, and other dangerous enemies. In this magical world, you have the opportunity to hire formidable units such as swordsmen and archers to aid in the defense of your castle. Prepare for an epic battle where your decision-making skills and strategic prowess will determine the fate of your kingdom.
